title: Daniil Medvedev Wins Tennis Title in Dubai
summary: Daniil Medvedev won the Dubai Tennis Championships title, but not in the way he wanted. His opponent, Tallon Griekspoor, could not play the final match because he hurt his leg in the semi-final. Medvedev said he hoped Griekspoor gets better soon. This is the first time Medvedev has won the same tournament twice. He played very well in Dubai without losing a set. The article also talks about travel problems because of airspace closures in the Middle East. In doubles, Henry Patten and Harri Heliovaara won their match in Dubai too.
